mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.content, t1.status, t1.cycle_type, t1.super_id, t1.description, t1.expiration_time, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t1.delete_time, t2.content AS option_content, t2.score as option_score, t2.status as option_status, t2.description AS option_description, t2.create_time AS option_create_time, t2.update_time AS option_update_time FROM SUBJECT t1 LEFT JOIN `option` t2 ON t1.id = t2.subject_id where t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject (content, status, cycle_type, super_id, description, expiration_time) VALUES (#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cycleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expirationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cycle_type = #{cycleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, super_id = #{superId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
